name: Xatu

ability.name: Time Seer
ability.effect: While Xatu is your Active Pokemon, play with your deck and Prize Cards face-up.

attacks.name: Future Sight
attacks.effect: Take the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck, put a Future Sight card on their deck (which deals 50 damage when drawn), rearrange the 3 cards as you like and return them to the top of their deck.

flavor: It's said that while this Pokemon has the power to predict the future, it's not powerful enough to change what it sees.
